https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kLI0CmOf1osdRQVuLjPCtAyoeRu.jpg After hearing about the huge demand for foreign talent in Japan, 'ordinary guy' Dave sets out on an outrageous mission to understand fame... by doing whatever it takes to get it. Big in Japan
